ctx: intros m x y z n.
exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap x, y, z : dart n : nat e : n = 0 H : inv_hmap m /\\ prec_L m one x y H0 : exd m z H1 : ~ expf m x (cA m zero y) H2 : ~ expf m x z H3 : ~ expf m (cA m zero y) z H4 : n < MF.degree m z Unable to unify "MF.degree_aux m z (MF.degree m z - n)" with "MF.degree_aux (L m one x y) z (MF.degree m z - n)".

ctx: intros m x y z n.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros m x y z n.
remember (L m one x y) as m1.
remember (cA m zero y) as y0.
exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap x, y, z : dart n' : nat n0 : S n' <> 0 m1 : fmap Heqm1 : m1 = L m one x y y0 : dart Heqy0 : y0 = cA m zero y Hinv := m1 : fmap Hexd := y0 : dart Hnexp1 := MF.degree m z : nat Hnexp2 : inv_hmap Hinv Hnexp3 : exd m z Hlt : ~ expf m x Hexd Unable to unify "(fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end) ?M2277 /\\ prec_L ?M2277 one ?M2278 ?M2279" with "expf m x z -> False".

original: intros m x y z n. destruct (eq_nat_dec n 0). - simpl. reflexivity. - destruct n as [|n']. + contradiction. + remember (L m one x y) as m1. remember (cA m zero y) as y0. intro Hinv. intro Hexd. intro Hnexp1. intro Hnexp2. intro Hnexp3. intro Hlt. apply degree_L1_merge_aux. * apply Hinv. * apply Hnexp1. * simpl in Hlt. apply lt_S_n in Hlt. simpl. apply Hlt.
